{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:25.740
    | text      = So, Jordan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.740
    | text      = I want to take a quick little moment before we get started here to discuss not having
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.059
    | text      = an episode on Friday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.059
    | text      = I've already sort of danced around this a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:35.700
    | text      = I think it's pretty self-explanatory for anybody who listens to the show why we didn't have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.059
    | text      = an episode.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.059
    | text      = Or at least the list of possibilities isn't very long.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.740
    | text      = But I want to just explain exactly what's up here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:47.419
    | text      = I texted you about this on Thursday morning that I felt that I'd lost some degree of perspective.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:52.299
    | text      = I couldn't really tell what direction was up and I was feeling completely lost.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:56.460
    | text      = There were many things that were happening that felt really important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.179
    | text      = Not necessarily surprising, but horrifying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:01.299
    | text      = And I was finding myself unable to process anything in a manner that would make it possible
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.279
    | text      = for me to comment on it in a responsible way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.580
    | text      = There was the Kenosha police shooting of Jacob Blake on the early evening of Sunday, August
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:14.340
    | text      = 23rd.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:15.340
    | text      = There was the unrest that broke out that evening in response to the shooting, which included
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:18.620
    | text      = a fair amount of property damage.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.340
    | text      = Then, on Tuesday, August 25th, a 17-year-old militia fascist shot and killed multiple protesters
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:26.379
    | text      = in Kenosha, despite the fact he lived in Illinois.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:29.059
    | text      = Then, on Wednesday, August 26th, a homicide suspect in Minneapolis took his own life while
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:34.019
    | text      = being pursued by the police, which some mistook as a police shooting and led to a bit of looting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.519
    | text      = Though the police didn't shoot the guy, it's a testament how little trust is there with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:43.539
    | text      = the public that they have in the police that the default position is to not trust them
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:47.379
    | text      = when they say they didn't shoot this person.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:50.379
    | text      = In a move that I absolutely resent, the police released security camera footage of the man
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:54.399
    | text      = taking his own life and not knowing how explicit the video was, I watched it on Twitter, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:58.740
    | text      = fucked me up a bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:00.700
    | text      = Then, on Thursday, there was the awareness of the imminent landfall of Hurricane Laura,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:05.640
    | text      = which was looking particularly nasty as a storm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.160
    | text      = When it arrived in Louisiana, it was tied with a hurricane from 164 years ago for the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:14.140
    | text      = title of strongest storm to ever arrive in that state.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:17.859
    | text      = That's just one of the many records that are being broken this hurricane season as warmer
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:21.019
    | text      = waters precipitate the earlier and stronger formation of tropical storms and hurricanes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:26.140
    | text      = When it came time to record an episode for Friday, I realized that I had no productive
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:29.359
    | text      = thing to add to any of this conversation, and the only responsible thing was to wait,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:34.000
    | text      = to calm down a little, listen, and try and regain some sense of this perspective.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:39.019
    | text      = There was an added difficulty for me professionally, and that had to do with the 17-year-old shooter
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:43.700
    | text      = in Kenosha, and how there was immediate talk of how outlets like Alex Jones were encouraging
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:48.819
    | text      = this kind of violence in the days leading up to the attack.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:52.460
    | text      = Very quickly, there were tweets talking about how Infowars had an article up promoting the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:56.440
    | text      = militia that was in Kenosha and involved with the shooting, although in fairness, they did
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:01.380
    | text      = forget to point out that this was an article posted elsewhere that Alex had just reposted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:05.619
    | text      = on Infowars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:07.079
    | text      = Still bad, but also lazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:08.779
    | text      = Screenshots were posted of that militia trying to legitimize themselves by pointing to that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:13.299
    | text      = Infowars article as proof of their credibility.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:16.140
    | text      = And then, on August 28th, Media Matters released an article with the headline, quote, Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:20.380
    | text      = Jones encouraged vigilante violence in the days before a gunman killed Kenosha protesters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:26.400
    | text      = This article is fine upon analysis, but it also is incredibly limited in its scope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:31.640
    | text      = This article only touches on a couple of comments that Alex made in the previous week and a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.500
    | text      = couple of posts on Infowars, which misses the reality that what happened, an armed extremist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:41.380
    | text      = killing protesters probably believing that they're doing so to save the country, is the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:45.259
    | text      = ultimate conclusion of a long-running campaign on Alex's show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:49.359
